title: Original Broadcast
content: Neon Genesis Evangelion originally aired from October 4, 1995, to March 27, 1996, on TV Tokyo.

title: Budget Constraints
content: The series famously faced severe budget constraints in its final episodes, leading to the minimalist animation style and extensive use of still frames.

title: Anime Influence
content: Evangelion is frequently cited as one of the most influential anime series of all time, credited with revitalizing the anime industry in the mid-1990s.
sourceName: The Rise and Fall of Anime

title: Anno's Depression
content: Director Hideaki Anno has openly discussed how his own battle with depression influenced the psychological themes of Evangelion.

title: Rebuild Series
content: The Rebuild of Evangelion is a tetralogy of films released between 2007 and 2021, retelling the original story with significant differences and a new conclusion.
